result.title: Recommendations on terrain trafficability and preventing measures
result.description: Based on the simulations done with the previous models and dialogue together with forest industry, recommendations will be defined dealing with threshold values of terrain trafficability (related to machine parameters and forest conditions) and new/adjusted organizations as additional preventive measures (alternate forwarder and skidder routing schemes, additional accessories…).

result.title: Database and models for soil bearing capacity and hydraulic transfer properties
result.description: Understanding of ground moisture behaviour in various circumstances is a key variable affecting soil bearing capacity and trafficability. 1st task aims to develop or to modify existing soil type specific hydrological model. In relation, models will be developed for estimation of mechanical properties of forest soils from soil texture, soil moisture status, and forest stand, which are applicable both in boreal and temperate regions. These 2 models will be based on a database collecting sampling and measurements carried out at different locations within the project.
